column2: Anita Blake: Circus of the Damned The Ingenue (2010) #1
column6: BEST-SELLING AUTHOR LAURELL K. HAMILTON'S HEROINE IS BACK! Morgues, by a rule, are pretty quiet places. But in a world of vamps and the rising dead, they can be positively hopping. Join animator Anita Blake as her search for a serial killer takes her to the most dangerous after-hours joint in St. Louis!
column8: | penciller:Brett Booth | penciller:Ron Lim | writer:Laurell K. Hamilton | writer:Jessica Ruffner | editor:Michael Horwitz
